vfbconnectr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Convenience function to turn vfb_connect summary results into data.frames

Source: R/utils.R
vc_df.Rd

Convenience function to turn vfb_connect summary results into data.frames

vc_df(x, ..., tibble = FALSE)

Arguments

x

A summary result from a VfbConnect call
...

additional arguments passed to as.data.frame or as_tibble
tibble

Whether to return a tibble rather than a regular data.frame

Examples

vc=VfbConnect()
KC_types = vc$get_subclasses("Kenyon cell", summary=TRUE)
vc_df(KC_types)

vc$neo_query_wrapper$get_type_TermInfo(list('FBbt_00003686'), summary=TRUE) %>%
vc_df
